quotes.message: hater is a person whose jealousy of another person success or achievements makes them verbally nit-pick any flaws no matter how small or just make up flaws in order to somehow try and belittle the successful person.
quotes.name: Rai M. Teves

quotes.message: A haters job is to hate you, and they stay on their job 24.7. So, if you're expecting them to clock out, and leave you alone think again.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: And these haters try to knock me but they can't knock me off the hinges.
quotes.name: Lil Wayne

quotes.message: Behind every sucessful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
quotes.name: Gloria Tesch

quotes.message: Don't doubt yourself, that's what haters are for.
quotes.name: Turcois Ominek

quotes.message: Don't try to win over the haters; you are not a jackass whisperer.
quotes.name: Brene Brown

quotes.message: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
quotes.name: Scylar Tyberius

quotes.message: Haters are my favorite. I've built an empire with the bricks they've thrown at me. Keep on hating.
quotes.name: C.M. Punk

quotes.message: Haters don't hate you. They hate themselves because you're a reflection of what they wish to be.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: Haters keep on hating, cause somebody's gotta do it.
quotes.name: Chris Brown

quotes.message: Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end.
quotes.name: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.message: Haters teach you to be grateful for the people you love, hard times teach to you be grateful for the times that are good, and God, well God teaches you everything you need to know.
quotes.name: Carniel Dunlop

quotes.message: I don't worry about the haters? They are just angry because the truth I speak contradicts the lie they live.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I only feel sorry for weak people. And mostly what I've come to find is that the weak people are the ones that are the haters.
quotes.name: R. Kelly

quotes.message: I think people are just haters. When they see people doing well, some people, if there's something wrong, they'll pick at that.
quotes.name: Alana Blanchard

quotes.message: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater.
quotes.name: Tavi Gevinson

quotes.message: Just be you. I've learned the hard way and in the end, some people are just so full of hate that no matter what you say or do, they'll always have something to say.
quotes.name: Megan Fox

quotes.message: My haters are my motivators.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: My whole thing is, haters are gonna hate, but haters are also going to click on your YouTube video just to watch it, so I don't really care. You helped me break the record. Even if you were watching just to hate on me, and now I hold the record, so I win.
quotes.name: Miley Cyrus

quotes.message: People who hate you because of a mere jealousy over your success hurt themselves in disguise. This is because you carry an image of who they wish they had become. Don't hate them back because they may also become like you one day and it will mean hurting that image you carry.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Respect your haters they're the only ones who think you're better than them.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: The best way to torture haters is with your happiness. There's nothing people hate more than seeing you be successful.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
quotes.name: Karina Barton

quotes.message: They're [haters] just building you up to knock you down. But for me, they haven't.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: To all the haters out there I wish you the best. You can't bring me down. I wake up everyday grateful for the opportunity and grateful to the fans.
quotes.name: Justin Bieber

quotes.message: You can't hate.love others without loving.hating yourself first.
quotes.name: Tyga
